content: लासक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [लस्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Playing, frolicking, sporting. {@--2@} Moving hither and thither. --कः {@--1@} A dancer. {@--2@} A peacock. {@--3@} Embracing. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --कं A room on the top of a building, turret.
लासिका {@--1@} A female dancer. {@--2@} A harlot, wanton or unchaste woman. {@--3@} A kind of dramatic performance.
